DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess contribution multimodal imaging , combine routine examination use Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) image procedure use adaptive optic retinal camera . This feasibility study limit number patient .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent form Beneficiary/affiliated French social security/social healthcare Active ou chronic Central Serous Chorioretinopathy least one eye Absence know ophthalmological pathology ophthalmological condition reveal examination Legal incapacity limit legal capacity Predictable poor adherence Subject without health insurance Pregnant breatfeeding woman Sujet étant dans la période d'exclusion d'une autre étude ou prévue par le `` fichier national de volontaires '' Presence transparent medium opacity damaging image quality Previous photosensitivity Recent treatment PhotoDynamic Therapy ( PDT ) Use drug induce photosensitivity
